commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
name: EfreiFlix MFE CI/CD

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, master ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, master ]

jobs:
  build-and-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    strategy:
      matrix:
        app: [efreiflix-shell, efreiflix-header, efreiflix-mfe-skeleton]

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '18.x'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install Root Dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Install App Dependencies
        run: |
          cd ${{ matrix.app }}
          npm ci

      - name: Build
        run: |
          cd ${{ matrix.app }}
          npm run build

      - name: Test
        run: |
          cd ${{ matrix.app }}
          npm test
        continue-on-error: true

      - name: Upload Build Artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: ${{ matrix.app }}-build
          path: ${{ matrix.app }}/dist
